::Zardus/Perndabot::

Zardus rolls out of the way of several shots, growling as he sees Dinobot 
engage Nemesis Enforcer in battle. He runs over to them, rolling under 
several shots as he did so, and stopping near the two.

"Enough," he says, "Both of you, stand down. We are allies, for now." He 
says, turning to fire a shot at Sixshot as he passes by the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot is blown through a rock by Sixshot's missiles, barely staying 
concious. He struggles to raise his missile launcher, firing at Ra's back.
